titleStmt.title: Memoires of the affairs of France during the reign of the present king Lewis the XIV. Containing the most noted exploits of the now Prince of Cond√©, the late Mareschal de Turenne, and all the chief commanders in the French armies. Done out of French. Licensed May the 10th, 1675. titleStmt.author: J. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.C. for T. Dring, at the Harrow at the corner of Chancery-lane in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Translator's 'Advertisement' (A2r): "This brief account of many great actions, translated out of the French history reduite en sommaire ...".
